overview:
Teodoro D’Ambrosio is an ambitious Italian-Switzerland IT entrepreneur with successful ventures in his track records.

Teodoro started his career in year 2000 by joining the founding team of Emaze; he brought the company to become market leader in Italy for software and network security. He personally managed the implementation of security and audit platform for some of the biggest Italian corporations; among those Telecom Italia (TIT:MI), Eni (ENI:MI), Generali (G:MI / ASG:DE) and Fiat Group (FR:MI / FIAT:DE).

Teodoro is managing director of Bravoavia (formerly Bravofly Russia) and sits on the board of Pixonic Ltd. He is partner of TA Venture, a Kiev-based venture fund. He is a strategic thinker and operating executive, launching new projects and building winning teams. He is focused on web based B2C businesses, due to his high technological expertise combined with a deep level of understanding in this field. Teodoro has engineering degree and an executive degree from Berkeley.
